name: Zombie Safari Road Trip
description:
Save the world from the cruel zombies’ invasion! They came from some unknown place, they’ve infected a lot of people and turn them all into the living dead – only you can save the situation! Rush into this fantastic Zombie Safari Road Trip game sitting behind the steering wheel of your powerful car and defeat them all!

The world is nearly ruined, so clench your fists and be ready to revenge these awful zombie creatures with the help of your super powerful car! Maneuver between the old cars, dilapidated buildings, abandoned constructions, try to knock down as many zombies as possible and just enjoy this fantastic opportunity to become the human race savior!

Zombie Safari Road Trip features:
Join this fantastic safari race to defeat all the zombies
Use different weapons and your own car to push them
Power your car up with nitro for more fun
Enjoy post-apocalypse surroundings made in 3D
